alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:54PM EST until February 27 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Greene County in west central Ohio... * Until 330 PM EST. * At 254 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lebanon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mason, Xenia, Lebanon, Wilmington, Monroe, Waynesville, Jamestown, Morrow, Hunter, South Lebanon, New Jasper, Maineville, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, Bowersville, Port William, Paintersville and State Route 63 at State Route 741. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 26 and 61. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 30 and 31. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio.
